sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { SafeAreaView, StatusBar, StyleSheet, Button, TextInput, Text, Pressable, View, Image, ScrollView, } from 'react-native'; import { Dimensions } from 'react-native'; import Ripple from 'react-native-material-ripple'; const Estimation = ({ navigation }) => { const B = (props) => {props.children} return ( navigation.goBack()}> navigation.navigate('Menu')} style={{alignItems: 'flex-end', marginRight: 20}}> Course Chauffeur : Nom Pr√©nom V√©hicule : nom Plaque : XXXX-XXXX D√©part : Adresse Destination : Adresse Dur√©e : 1h30 Date : XX/XX Tarif : XX‚Ç¨ navigation.navigate("Paiement")}> Valider navigation.goBack()}> Annuler ); }; const styles = StyleSheet.create({ text:{ fontSize: 18, }, }); export default Estimation;
